column1: Saturated hydraulic conductivity of the least transmissive layer when a water impermeable layer exists at a depth between 50 and 100 centimeters
Group D: < 1 micrometer/second (or depth to impermeable layer < 50cm or water table < 60cm)

column1: Saturated hydraulic conductivity of the least transmissive layer when any water impermeable layer exists at a depth greater than 100 centimeters
